title: Is the Shop supposed to reset?
body:
I saw in another post that there was a bug with Your Shop not giving the right discounts. Of the 6 skin discounts I got, only one of the champions have I actually played. Is this intended?

If not, am I gonna get a shop reset? In the same post, they said we would.

replies.body: There was a small hiccup with Your Shop not loading for a lot of people, so in order to get that running correctly again we forced a reset. There's a chance that your sales might have reset when we pushed that out, but it was in no way guaranteed. It kind of sucks that you didn't get too many sales that you wanted, but keep in mind these sales do still have an element of RNG to them.
